message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn! How about a slightly better deal for me this time?
Come on, let's meet in the middle
This is getting us nowhere - let's be reasonable. This is a slight improvement on my last offer.
You're losing value, I'm being generous
This is my final offer - a straight 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, because I won't accept anything less.
